thread.title: French presidential candidate Macron to meet with May
thread.title_full: French presidential candidate Macron to meet with May

title: French presidential candidate Macron to meet with May
text:
09pm GMT French presidential candidate Macron to meet with May Emmanuel Macron, head of the political movement En Marche !, or Forward !, and candidate for the 2017 French presidential election, attends a political rally in Toulon, France February 18, 2017. REUTERS/Jean-Paul Pelissier 
PARIS French presidential candidate Emmanuel Macron will be meeting with Prime Minister Theresa May on Tuesday during his visit to London, his spokeswoman said. 
Macron will be received by May at 10 Downing Street at 13:30 GMT for an hour to talk about Brexit and European defence policy, a spokesman told Reuters. 
The 39 year-old former economy minister will also meet Chancellor of the Exchequer Philip Hammond at 15:30, the spokesman said. He will be holding a campaign rally in London later on Tuesday. 
(Reporting by Emmanuel Jarry and Michel Rose; editing by John Irish) Next In World News
